35  package fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.utils;
36  
37  import fr.mcc.ginco.ark.IIDGeneratorService;
38  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.NodeLabel;
39  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.Thesaurus;
40  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.ThesaurusArray;
41  import fr.mcc.ginco.beans.ThesaurusConcept;
42  import fr.mcc.ginco.exceptions.BusinessException;
43  import fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.pojo.ThesaurusArrayView;
44  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.INodeLabelService;
45  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusArrayService;
46  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusConceptService;
47  import fr.mcc.ginco.services.IThesaurusService;
48  import fr.mcc.ginco.utils.DateUtil;
49  import org.codehaus.plexus.util.StringUtils;
50  import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
51  
52  import javax.inject.Inject;
53  import javax.inject.Named;
54  import java.util.ArrayList;
55  import java.util.HashSet;
56  import java.util.List;
57  
58  
59  @Component("thesaurusArrayViewConverter")
60  public class ThesaurusArrayViewConverter {	
61  	@Inject
62  	@Named("thesaurusService")
63  	private IThesaurusService thesaurusService;
64  	
65  	@Inject
66  	@Named("thesaurusArrayService")
67  	private IThesaurusArrayService thesaurusArrayService;
68  
69  	@Inject
70  	@Named("thesaurusConceptService")
71  	private IThesaurusConceptService thesaurusConceptService;
72  
73  	@Inject
74  	@Named("nodeLabelService")
75  	private INodeLabelService nodeLabelService;
76  
77  	@Inject
78  	@Named("generatorService")
79  	private IIDGeneratorService generatorService;	
80  
81  	public ThesaurusArray convert(ThesaurusArrayView source)
82  			throws BusinessException {
83  		ThesaurusArray hibernateRes;
84  		if (StringUtils.isEmpty(source.getIdentifier())) {
85  			hibernateRes = new ThesaurusArray();
86  			hibernateRes.setIdentifier(generatorService.generate(ThesaurusArray.class));
87  
88  		} else {
89  			hibernateRes = thesaurusArrayService.getThesaurusArrayById(source
90  					.getIdentifier());
91  		}
92  		if ("".equals(source.getThesaurusId())) {
93  			throw new BusinessException(
94  					"ThesaurusId is mandatory to save a concept",
95  					"mandatory-thesaurus");
96  		} else {
97  			Thesaurus thesaurus = thesaurusService.getThesaurusById(source
98  					.getThesaurusId());
99  			hibernateRes.setThesaurus(thesaurus);
100 		}	
101 
102 		if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(source.getSuperOrdinateId())) {
103 			hibernateRes
104 					.setSuperOrdinateConcept(thesaurusConceptService
105 							.getThesaurusConceptById(source
106 									.getSuperOrdinateId()));
107 		}
108 
109 		if (hibernateRes.getConcepts() == null) {
110 			hibernateRes.setConcepts(new HashSet<ThesaurusConcept>());
111 		}
112 		hibernateRes.getConcepts().clear();
113 
114 		for (String conceptId : source
115 				.getConcepts()) {
116 			ThesaurusConcept concept = thesaurusConceptService
117 					.getThesaurusConceptById(conceptId);
118 			if (concept == null) {
119 				throw new BusinessException("Concept doest not exist",
120 						"concept-does-not-exist");
121 			}
122 			hibernateRes.getConcepts().add(concept);
123 		}
124 		
125 		hibernateRes.setOrdered(false);
126 		
127 		
128 
129 		return hibernateRes;
130 	}
131 
132 	public ThesaurusArrayView convert(final ThesaurusArray source)
133 			throws BusinessException {
134 		ThesaurusArrayView thesaurusArrayView = new ThesaurusArrayView();
135 
136 		thesaurusArrayView.setIdentifier(source.getIdentifier());
137 		
138 		if (source.getSuperOrdinateConcept() != null) {
139 			thesaurusArrayView.setSuperOrdinateId(source
140 					.getSuperOrdinateConcept().getIdentifier());
141 			thesaurusArrayView
142 					.setSuperOrdinateLabel(thesaurusConceptService
143 							.getConceptLabel(source.getSuperOrdinateConcept()
144 									.getIdentifier()));
145 
146 		}
147 
148 		List<String> conceptsIds = new ArrayList<String>();
149 		for (ThesaurusConcept concept: source.getConcepts()) {
150 			conceptsIds.add(concept.getIdentifier());
151 		}
152 		thesaurusArrayView
153 				.setConcepts(conceptsIds);
154 
155 		NodeLabel label = nodeLabelService
156 				.getByThesaurusArrayAndLanguage(source.getIdentifier());
157 
158 		thesaurusArrayView.setLabel(label.getLexicalValue());
159 		thesaurusArrayView.setLanguage(label.getLanguage().getId());
160 		thesaurusArrayView.setNodeLabelId(label.getIdentifier());
161 		thesaurusArrayView.setCreated(DateUtil.toString(label.getCreated()));
162 		thesaurusArrayView.setModified(DateUtil.toString(label.getModified()));
163 		thesaurusArrayView.setThesaurusId(source.getThesaurus()
164 				.getThesaurusId());
165 
166 		return thesaurusArrayView;
167 	}
168 }
